name: Indices of the squarefree terms in the sequence of exponentially odd numbers.
comment: The asymptotic density of this sequence is A059956/A065463 = Product_{p prime} (1 - 1/(p^3 + p^2 - p)) = 0.86299074784... .
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: expOddQ[n_] := AllTrue[FactorInteger[n][[;; , 2]], OddQ]; Position[Select[Range[120], expOddQ], _?SquareFreeQ, Heads -> False] // Flatten
program: list(lim) = {my(c = 0); for(k = 1, lim, if(isexpodd(k), c++; if(issquarefree(k), print1(c, ", ")))); }
author: _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 13 2025

name: Indices of the even terms in the sequence of exponentially odd numbers.
comment: The asymptotic density of this sequence is 2/5.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: expOddQ[n_] := AllTrue[FactorInteger[n][[;; , 2]], OddQ]; Position[Select[Range[350], expOddQ], _?EvenQ] // Flatten
program: list(lim) = {my(c = 0); for(k = 1, lim, if(isexpodd(k), c++; if(!(k % 2), print1(c, ", "))));}
author: _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 13 2025
